data.title: United States Pacific Fleet Organization, 1 May 1945
data.meta_description: Commander in Chief, U.S. Pacific Fleet and Pacific Ocean Areas Fleet Adm. C. W. Nimitz (3)       Deputy Commander in Chief, Pacific Fleet and Pacific Ocean Areas Vice Admiral J. H. Towers (15)       Chief of Joint Staff Vice Admiral C. H. McMorris (107) BB 38 PENNSYLVANIA (Flagship) Captain C. F. Martin (427)
data.text:
ADMINISTRATIVE TITLES AND AUTHORIZED ABBREVIATIONS

1. The following is a list of administrative titles, together with authorized abbreviated titles. This list includes only titles used with some frequency in the Pacific Ocean Areas.

2. In the interest of brevity, activities with the same title except for a different numeral are represented in this list by a single title including "(number)." In such cases, the number in the long title should be spelled out (e.g., Commander Cruiser Division SIX); the arabic numeral should be used in the abbreviated title (e.g., ComCruDiv 6).

3. Recommendations for changes or additions to this list are invited.

LONG TITLE SHORT TITLE Air Base Commander, KWAJALEIN AirBaseCom KWAJALEIN Air Defense Commander IWO JIMA AirDefCom IWO JIMA Atoll Commander, ENIWETOK AtCom ENIWETOK Atoll Commander, KWAJALEIN AtCom
